dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data

dataset_fields.label: Dataset DOI
dataset_fields.from_placeholder: insert DOI of the dataset if available

dataset_fields.label: Information Website
dataset_fields.help_text: links to project website or dataset's page

dataset_fields.label: Theme / Category
dataset_fields.help_text: Provide links to descriptions of the themes; separate by comma. E.g.: http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/theme/ad, http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/theme/au.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial Coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: Draw and edit the dataset extent as rectangles on the map, or paste a GeoJSON Polygon or Multipolygon geometry below, or create a bounding box from coordinates

dataset_fields.label: Coordinate Reference System
dataset_fields.help_text: Provide link to OGC definition of the CRS, http://docs.opengeospatial.org/DRAFTS/18-058.html#_crs_identifier_list, e.g. http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326

dataset_fields.label: Spatial Resolution
dataset_fields.help_text: Spatial Resolution (the unit is determined by the resolution type)

dataset_fields.label: Spatial Resolution Measured
dataset_fields.help_text:
In meters: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a Dataset, measured in metres.
As angular scale: Spatial resolution expressed as equivalent scale [ISO-19115], [ISO-19115-1], by using a representative fraction (e.g., 1:1,000, 1:1,000,000).
As angular distance: Spatial resolution expressed as angular distance [ISO-19115-1], by using a decimal degree.
As vertical distance: Spatial resolution expressed as vertical distance [ISO-19115-1].

dataset_fields.label: Temporal Resolution
dataset_fields.help_text: e.g. 'P2Y3M20D' describes a period 2 years, 3 months and 20 days or 'P1D' descibes a period of 1 day

dataset_fields.label: Is Version of
dataset_fields.help_text: Insert according dataset's Identifier. A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation. Changes in version imply substantive changes in content rather than differences in format.

dataset_fields.label: Parent Dataset
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included (https://dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#isPartOf).

dataset_fields.label: Derived from
dataset_fields.help_text: The dataset from which the current dataset was derived. Provide the URL of the according datasets. In case of multiple Entries, split with comma ",".

dataset_fields.label: Dataset License
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.
dataset_fields.help_text: Recommended best practice is to identify the license using a URI. Examples of such licenses can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/.

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: leave blank to use resource file name

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the resource

resource_fields.label: Resource License
resource_fields.form_placeholder: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.
resource_fields.help_text: Recommended best practice is to identify the license using a URI. Examples of such licenses can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/.
